name: Super Amazeballs
description: SUPER AMAZEBALLS is a VR dexterity puzzle game that'll twist your brain! Using both hands: Tilt, spin, and rotate 3D 'amazeballs' to roll a pinball through mind bending tracks!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 2500 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GTX 680 Storage: 263 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i7-4770k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 263 MB available space
